sentences.en: A beluga whale swims in a tank at the Vancouver Aquarium.
sentences.cn: 一头白色大鳇鱼或叫大白鲸在北美洲的范库弗峰水族馆里游弋着.

sentences.en: I'm going to the aquarium with my parents this Sunday.
sentences.cn: 这个星期天,我要和父母一起到水族宫去.

sentences.en: I'm going to the aquarium, but I can't find the way.
sentences.cn: 我要去水族宫, 但找不着路了.

sentences.en: In Amsterdam the girls all stand in the windows shimmering as tantalising as tropical fish beyond the gleam of aquarium glass.
sentences.cn: 在阿姆斯特丹，姑娘们都站在窗后，光芒四射柔情撩人宛如水族馆玻璃背后脉脉含情的热带鱼。

sentences.en: Inside was peacock water, rocks and weed'showing as in an aquarium.
sentences.cn: 礁石内侧:海水绚烂, 暗礁林立,海藻丛生,就象水族馆的生态展览一样.

sentences.en: Look! There is fish, seaweed and shells in my aquarium.
sentences.cn: 你看, 我的鱼缸里有鱼, 海草和贝壳.

sentences.en: Michelle and her friends are at the aquarium in Brooklyn.
sentences.cn: Michelle和她的朋友们在参观Brooklyn的水族馆.

sentences.en: Recently the bakers created an octopus complete with tentacles and suckers for a charity event held for a local aquarium.
sentences.cn: 最近，面包师为当地水族馆举行的慈善活动制作了这只章鱼，它拥有完整的触手和吸盘。

sentences.en: Since the shark has been on display, aquarium attendance has increased.
sentences.cn: 由于该鲨鱼的展出, 水族馆观众增加了.

sentences.en: The aquarium has many tanks of fish.
sentences.cn: 那家水族馆有许多装在水箱中的鱼类.

sentences.en: The occasion begins well with a visit to the local aquarium.
sentences.cn: 会见是以参观当地的水族馆开始的.

sentences.en: There were many visitors watching sharks and seals at the aquarium.
sentences.cn: 在水族管有许多游客观看鲨鱼和海豹.

sentences.en: They subscribe to such magazines as The Aquarium, and join clubs.
sentences.cn: 他们订阅诸如“水族馆”这样的杂志, 并且加入俱乐部.

sentences.en: They watched the fish swimming in the aquarium.
sentences.cn: 他们看着鱼在水缸里游着.

sentences.en: We had such a good time at the aquarium.
sentences.cn: 我们在水族馆玩得真开心.

sentences.en: We saw a ray at the aquarium.
sentences.cn: 我们在水族馆看见了一只鳐。

sentences.en: Yesterday I saw dolphins in the aquarium in the park.
sentences.cn: 昨天我在公园的水族馆看到了白鳍豚.

phrases.tran_cn: 温哥华水族馆（北美洲三大水族馆之一）

trans.tran_cn: 水族馆，水族槽，养鱼缸，玻璃鱼池
trans.tran_en: a clear glass or plastic container for fish and other water animals
